SELECT t2.NAME AS NAME FROM `DB_PRIVS` t1 INNER JOIN `DBS` t2 ON t1.DB_ID = t2.DB_ID AND t1.DB_PRIV IN ('CREATE', 'UPDATE', 'ALL') WHERE t1.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'USER' AND t1.PRINCIPAL_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT t3.NAME AS NAME FROM `TBL_PRIVS` t1 INNER JOIN `TBLS` t2 ON t1.TBL_ID = t2.TBL_ID AND t1.TBL_PRIV IN ('CREATE', 'UPDATE', 'ALL') INNER JOIN `DBS` t3 ON t2.DB_ID = t3.DB_ID WHERE t1.PRINCIPAL_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY NAME
